paper_abstract: Semismooth Newton method is an effective method for solving a nonsmooth equation, which arises from a reformulation of the complementarity problem. Under appropriate conditions, we verify the monotone convergence of the method. We also present semismooth Newton Schwarz iterative methods for the nonsmooth equation. Under suitable conditions, the methods exhibit monotone and superlinear convergence properties.
paper_title: Semismooth Newton Schwarz iterative methods for the linear complementarity problem
